page.title: 18TRADE
page.content: Falston nursery is a small but popular garden centre in Newlands lane, Culverstone.It sells all kinds of plants & shrubs.On a week day it has approx. 100 people visiting it. Vision Windows used to be a hairdressers.It is a brick building with outside stairs and garages around the back.They fit windows locally and also a wide area of Britain. The bakery is situated on the A227 in Meopham,in a small building.They do not only sell to local customers but to passing motorists and other shops.the bread and cakes are baked on the premises. There are also other trades such as:- Bowes Patterns And Moulds Culverstone Stores Garages Beekeeping T.V. And Radio Repairs
